name: Your Trusty Companion?
description:
This is my First GameJam!

This is a story based platforming game with a boss!

use the arrow keys to move, and try out the invincibility button if you are having trouble with the Boss >:D.

Also, try and go slowly on the first time, so you can get all the dialogue!

there is a reset button at the top right, if you get stuck!

Best of Luck! 

Dependencies-

I used some assets from ansimuz (Warped caves)

I used undertale flowey theme from toby fox

I used the Monserrat font

Features:

-Music and sound fx

-Platformer Physics

-Bossfight

-story based dialogue

And most of all....

-lack of trust!
